title: WATCH: Justin Timberlake pulls off amazing golf shots
text:
Manage WATCH: Justin Timberlake pulls off amazing golf shots Justin Timberlake is known for being one of the most talented entertainers in the world, but he can also put on a show on a golf course as well. The pop   
Justin Timberlake is known for being one of the most talented entertainers in the world, but he can also put on a show on a golf course as well. 
The pop star/movie star/late-night TV funny man made some amazing shots during the AT&T Pebble Beach Pro-Am this weekend, nearly getting a hole in one and chipping in on a few other occasions. 
Playing partner Justin Rose captured the near ace on a cell phone, but the CBS cameras captured it as well. You can see Timberlake's near miss and tap in birdie in the above video. 
Here are a few shots he made after the almost-ace. 
After that chip-in on No. 16, he followed it up with this one hole later. — PGA TOUR (@PGATOUR) February 11, 2017 
There was a lot of celebrating for Timberlake all weekend. 
That birdie feeling: pic.twitter.com/BQVCclGIEU — PGA TOUR (@PGATOUR) February 11, 2017 Author
